snippet: Opponents view the unfinished mosque and Islamic center as a beachhead for Muslim expansion in Brooklyn and a beacon for anti-Semitism.
abstract: Sheepshead Bay Journal; mosque and Islamic community center being built in the Sheepshead Bay section of Brooklyn has split the multiethnic, but mostly Russian-Jewish, residential neighborhood; mosque's backers say area's Muslim families need a place to pray, but a determined group of opponents sees the mosque as a beachhead for Muslim expansion in Brooklyn and a beacon for antisemitism.
lead_paragraph: Opponents view the unfinished mosque and Islamic center as a beachhead for Muslim expansion in Brooklyn and a beacon for anti-Semitism.

headline.seo: Mosque Being Built in Brooklyn Continues to Face Opposition
headline.main: A Planned Mosque Inches Along, but Critics Remain
headline.print_headline: A Planned Mosque Inches Along, but Critics Remain
